title: New: COTE – Cruel
body:
Brooklyn’s **COTE** is rapidly becoming one of my favourite new songwriters, possessing the rare ability to coherently tell a story, in a bewitching and engaging manner, all whilst crafting it to her stunning vocal.

Her latest track, Cruel, is another Joni Mitchell-esque beauty, suggesting that her forthcoming debut album is shaping up to be rather special.
